DOC.brief_summary: In pre-post observational study , investigator enroll follow cohort 50 adult undergoing sleeve gastrectomy surgery weight loss . Pre-operatively 6 12 month post-operatively , investigator use state-of-the-art metabolic image technique evaluate calcium metabolism skeletal health . Specific outcome include intestinal calcium absorption capacity , bone mineral density ( BMD ) assess dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) quantitative compute tomography ( QCT ) , bone structure assess QCT high-resolution peripheral QCT ( HR-pQCT ) .
